idea-plugin.name: Maven
idea-plugin.description:
Provides Maven support. The following features are available:
  • Maven Projects tool window.
  • Dedicated module type.
  • Maven repositories support.
  • Full editing support for the pom.xml file.
  • Possibility to import Maven projects.
  • Running and debugging Maven goals.
  • Compiling.

registryKey.description: Collect local maven statistics. Used in Internal mode. Does not affect FUS
Run maven goals via mvn.sh/mvn.bat
Dedicated maven indexer VM arguments, restart maven server or IDEA after changing this parameter
Dedicated maven indexer
Use cache for plugin resolving
Skip update local gav index in unit tests

In order to support different 'testSource' and 'testTarget' compiler options, IntelliJ IDEA will create separate modules for such projects (IDEA-85478).\nAvailable only when Import using IntelliJ Workspace API is enabled.
Enable importing of the maven compiler plugin arguments
Shows checkbox to run m2e compatibility
Keep existing module names after maven project reimport
Defines how IntelliJ IDEA modules are named. Possible values: artifactId, groupId.artifactId, aggregatorArtifactId.artifactId, folderName. Other values default to artifactId
Create maven dummy module on import
Make fast project preimport
Make fast project preimport only, without running maven import
Single Maven server per idea project, .mvn could be ignored
Always reset maven dependencies and folders
Print maven server stacktraces in log
Delete invalid maven Entries
Enable Maven spy events to be printed in Build Tool Window console
Debug maven server
Maven server remove -javaagent vm parameter
Resolve maven dependencies sequentially (slow in case of many maven modules)
Use custom maven dependencies resolver to speed up dependency resolution
Generate sources for aggregator projects (instead of all projects) for better performance
Maximal parallel tasks to read and resolve. If equal or less than zero, no limitations applied
Create IDEA module dependencies to uber jars for Maven projects that use Maven Shade plugin
During sync, generate uber jars for Maven projects that use Maven Shade plugin
During sync, remap classes in uber jars for Maven projects that use Maven Shade plugin
Refresh resolved artifacts after Maven sync
During incremental sync, resolve dependencies incrementally
Create source roots corresponding to compileSourceRoots and multireleaseOutput during Maven sync
Use IDEA confirming trust manager for maven importer
Build additional jars with classifier
Enable performance trace collection from the Maven server side collected by OTLP java agent

param.name: runOrder
param.values: alphabetical, reversealphabetical, random, hourly, failedfirst, balanced, filesystem

param.name: forkMode
param.values: never, once, always, perthread, none, pertest

param.name: runOrder
param.values: alphabetical, reversealphabetical, random, hourly, failedfirst, balanced, filesystem
